/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtMyMnuDDao.selectPtMyMnuD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.MNU_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_RESC_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.USER_UID DESC, N.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_PID, T.COMP_ID, T.FLD_YN, T.MNU_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.MNU_ID, T.MNU_RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.MNU_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MNU_RESC_NM,
FROM PT_MY_MNU_D T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID = #{mnuLoutCombId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.MNU_LOUT_COMB_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
